礭字的基本解释

礭
què
敲击：“以麈尾礭床，呼何共坐。”
古同“确”，坚固。
水激石险峻不平的样子。

礭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［què］
［《龍龕手鑒》苦角切］
(1)水激石险峻不平貌。一说水激石声。刘良注：“石聲也。”
(2)坚定貌。
(3)敲打。

礭字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【石字部】　礭； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页838第27
【篇海】苦角切，音䐨。鞭也。　又【郭璞·江賦】礐硞䃕礭。【註】皆水激石，嶮峻不平貌。

礭字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
礭字的起名意思

暂无。

Yin
Basic explanation of words
Yin
què
Percussion: "Sit together on the bed with the tail tail."
The ancient Tong is "true" and strong.
The water-induced rock looks steep and uneven.
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［què］
[The Bitter Angle Cut from "Long Niche Handbook"]
(1) The water rock is steep and uneven. One talk about the sound of water-induced rock. Liu Liang's Note: "Sound of Stone."
(2) Firm appearance.
(3) Beat.
Yin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Set 2] [Stone Character Department] 　礭; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 838 27
【Pianhai】Bitter angle cut, sound dysfunctional. Whip too.　[Guo Pu·Jiang Fu] 礐硞䃕礭. [Note] They are all water rock stones, and their appearance is steep and uneven.
